pages.text: $(marked)The Mind$() is one of the more unusual places for a cultist to visit, yet it is indeed very important. $(br)It is the place where one must fight the $(marked)Silver Thread$(), an entity of the soul which sets boundaries (and sanity etc. we all know that).

In order to enter the Mind, one must first consume $(l:alchemy/entry_laudanum)Magic Laudanum$() and then sleep in a bed.$(br)Then, if the player is secured with at least one $(l:lessons/lesson_recruiting)Cultist$(), they will find theirselves in the Mind.

The Player will find theirselves between two layers, from which one is made out of $(item)Fabric of Passion$() (above) while the other one is made out of $(item)Fabric of Reason$() (below), though more Fabric of Passion might be found underneath it. $(br)Additionally, another layer of Passion can be found over the current one.
Looking around in this place, one might sooner or later find an anomaly.
